keyword: how many calories in hot dog bun
title: How Many Calories in a Hot Dog Bun?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in hot dog bun, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium details, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Hot Dog Bun?
assumptions: Standard white hot dog bun (~50 g), plain, no toppings or butter; commercially baked.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, ingredients (e.g., enriched vs. whole grain), and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard hot dog bun contains about 120 kcal and 22 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one hot dog bun?
faqs.a: Approximately 120 kcal for a standard white hot dog bun.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a hot dog bun?
faqs.a: About 22 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 3 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in hot dog buns?
faqs.a: Yes, around 210 mg per bun due to added salt in baking.

faqs.q: How does whole grain affect calories in hot dog bun?
faqs.a: Whole wheat buns are similar at ~125 kcal but offer more fiber.

faqs.q: Do hot dog buns have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Roughly 4 g protein and 2 g fat per bun, mostly from flour and minimal oils.
